TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
What have you done? You released that Necromancer we captured in the Borderlands?
What have you done? You released that Necromancer we captured in the Borderlands?
What have you done? You released that Necromancer we captured in the Borderlands?
What have you done? You released that Necromancer we captured in the Borderlands?
Syrus... I'm sorry. It was such a long time ago, and he had information we needed. I gave him his freedom in exchange.
Syrus... I'm sorry. It was such a long time ago, and he had information we needed. I gave him his freedom in exchange.
Syrus... I'm sorry. It was such a long time ago, and he had information we needed. I gave him his freedom in exchange.
Syrus... I'm sorry. It was such a long time ago, and he had information we needed. I gave him his freedom in exchange.
And then you lied to me! And what is all this about following your sword?
And then you lied to me! And what is all this about following your sword?
And then you lied to me! And what is all this about following your sword?
And then you lied to me! And what is all this about following your sword?
I don't know - honestly.
I don't know - honestly.
I don't know - honestly.
I don't know - honestly.
Are you working for Lord Bane?
Are you working for Lord Bane?
Are you working for Lord Bane?
Are you working for Lord Bane?
No! I'm trying to STOP him!
No! I'm trying to STOP him!
No! I'm trying to STOP him!
No! I'm trying to STOP him!
How can I believe you? I cannot stay here. Humans! You are full of lies and deceit. I am leaving. Farewell.
